# Photo Submission for Fuvahmulah Website

Thank you for your interest in contributing photos to the Fuvahmulah website!

## Getting Started

Photos can be submitted in two ways:

### 1. Ì≥ß Email Submission
Send high-resolution images to: **photos@singleatoll-tourism.com**

Include with each submission:
- Location name
- Date taken
- Brief description
- Your name and contact information
- Confirmation you have rights to use/distribute

### 2. Ì≥ù Contact Form
Visit https://fuvahmulah.info/contact
- Select "Photo Submission for Website" from the subject dropdown
- Include location and description in message
- Attach images if possible

## Photo Requirements

- **Resolution:** Minimum 1200px on longest side
- **Format:** JPG, PNG, or WebP
- **Authenticity:** Photos must be from Fuvahmulah
- **Lighting:** Natural lighting preferred, minimal filters
- **Content:** Must show real location conditions

## Acceptable Topics

‚úÖ Beaches and landscapes
‚úÖ Diving and marine life
‚úÖ Accommodations and resorts
‚úÖ Local dining and restaurants
‚úÖ Cultural experiences
‚úÖ Water sports and activities
‚úÖ Sunset and nature

## Not Acceptable

‚ùå Generic stock photos
‚ùå AI-generated images
‚ùå Overly filtered/edited photos
‚ùå Photos from other locations
‚ùå Copyrighted images without permission

## What Happens Next

1. We review your submission for quality and authenticity
2. Photos are optimized for web (sizing, compression)
3. Credit given to photographer (if requested)
4. Photo added to website within 1 week
5. You're notified when it's live!

## Questions?

Contact us at: photos@singleatoll-tourism.com
